body.p: Even though TC employees had already rendered all of the service, AC attributes a portion of the replacement award to post‑combination remuneration cost in accordance with paragraph B59 of IFRS 3, because the replacement awards require one year of post‑combination service. The total vesting period is five years—the vesting period for the original acquiree award completed before the acquisition date (four years) plus the vesting period for the replacement award (one year).
